exceptions.tactic: specialize (H s1 p1 scs P H0).
exceptions.exn: The reference H0 was not found in the current environment.
The reference s2 was not found in the current environment.
The reference s3 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros. unfold always_sc in *. intros. specialize (H s1 p1 scs P H0). revert s2. induction H. - intros. constructor. intros. apply H with s2. auto. - intros. constructor. intros. apply H1 with s3. auto.
